website_summaries.verdict: The HTC Desire 510 doesn't have the specs to excite committed tech fans, but it handles the basics well, has 4G LTE for superfast data speeds, and it doesn't cost the earth.
pros: The HTC Desire 510 has 4G LTE, simple to use Android KitKat software, a capable processor and battery
For all that, its price tag is extremely reasonable
cons: The camera isn't suitable for anything other than quick emergency snaps and its chunky design won't turn any heads

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste money on this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Most of the phones 4gb data is bloatware. I downloaded 4 apps and I do not even have enough space to update other apps.( The apps I downloaded are stored on an sd card and not even the phone.) If you do not want to download any apps this phone works for talk and text. You will, however, need to get a stylus to scroll if you have sweaty hands. Any moisture will smudge and cause the screen to dance and become unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hoover

customer_reviews.title: no space
customer_reviews.text: I guess a good temporary phone. Only 2 gb of space and after yu delete something on the phone the other apps got bigger so less and less things the phone was useful for. The phone was in good condition and despite how many times I throw it screen first on the ground it still works with little problems sides space which is an issue
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Phone Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this phone. There is only four gigs on the actual phone so you will never be able to download more than 1-2 apps. Installing an SD card does not work as a solution. I have been very disappointed with this purchase and it is my hope that a potential buyer will not make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant activate it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from this seller . I bought this phone 2 times and they will not scan the barcode so I can activate. I know it's a good phone had mine for 2 years still doing good I had to return it twice it was suppose to be a Xmas present for my mom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money please on stolen phones.
customer_reviews.text: Package came already opened, seal taped over and when I tried to activate it the phones serial number didn't work and so I called customer service, found out the phone was reported as stolen and still locked.
customer_reviews.author: Luxia Hexist

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my phone! Beautiful color and clarity on screen,screen size bigger then expected,buttons easy to get at and no problems... on time and everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Peterson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The price is too low for such a great phone! I bought this, it came fast and it works great. I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: it was NOT compatible with virgin mobile like it should be and trying to get a hold ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone. so far nothing wrong with the phone itself; however, it was NOT compatible with virgin mobile like it should be and trying to get a hold of HTC to rectify has been a struggle. Virgin mobile customer service stated that many activations have been difficult due to jailbroken phones not for certain companies are being sold through amazon
customer_reviews.author: breanne

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, the reason I didn't get it 5 stars is because there isn't a lot of phone storage. I am constantly deleting or uninstalling apps

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 phones in 2 months all were defective .. im done with virgin mobile phones .

customer_reviews.title: Bad calibration
customer_reviews.text: This phone had so many glitches and would never calibrate right to my boyfriends fingers. I didn't have a hard time but if you have larger fingers I wouldn't recommend. Maybe we just got a bad one who knows.
customer_reviews.author: savanna

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT WORK ON VIRGIN MOBILE CANADA NETWORK
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is awesome. The down side: it will not work with Virgin Mobile Canada. I bought a Virgin Canada sim card and called the network to get the phone activated. The technician confirmed that upon the insertion of a Virgin Canada sim card and upon activation, it would work if it weren't locked.
customer_reviews.author: amasan

customer_reviews.title: Great condition.
customer_reviews.text: Okay phone. Great condition... Just not enough storage space.. going to need to return it and get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's bloated but an SD mostly solves that. GREAT phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bloatware is a bit obtrusive, but other than that, I'm super happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone, But I recommend getting a memory card ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone , But I recommend getting a memory card also because your 4GB go by really fast .

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The microphone stop working after a week for no reason

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!!! Birthday Gift to my boyfriend. ......he loves it sooo much best virgin mobile phone they ever made. ...I hope my man dosent have no thots number in is new HTC boo boo..He feeling it too much....WE LOVE IT

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. I had an HTC ONE V that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I had an HTC ONE V that I replaced this phone with. Great improvement. The only con is that is seems like it has very little phone memory. Even with a memory card, I cannot move very many apps to the card.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Franklin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible phone. Camera has no flash and works like a potato despite claiming 5 mp. Screen is way too sensitive, phone will randomly turn on in my pants . When I put a lock on the screen it dialed emergency services like twice a day. Spend your money on another phone.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Penna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive on time but seems to ba working well
customer_reviews.author: dave king

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the delivery speed of this package
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the delivery speed of this package. I received it on time and everything was accounted for. However I was unhappy with the overall product because for whatever reason the phone was defective and neither htc or virgin mobile could activate it. It was my hope that we could've had it up and running on Christmas day but I had to return it and buy a new one so we haven't even had a phone since it was originally ordered. Very disappointed with this particular experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Daniels

customer_reviews.title: storage
customer_reviews.text: it was a big waste of money.the camera is very poor and has no flash.the internal storage absolutely sucks.I feel like the manufacturer should send a new phone to everyone that bought this phone.
customer_reviews.author: mike reedy

customer_reviews.title: but that prevents annoying selfies. Internal storage is entirely inadequate and limits ...
customer_reviews.text: Big screen with quality images. My front camera stopped working a couple months after I bought it, but that prevents annoying selfies. Internal storage is entirely inadequate and limits the apps you can have. Comes with lots of bloatware. While the price is decent, I wouldn't buy again, nor suggest to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. One thing i wish they would change is the screen and the camera. The screen is a descent size and the camera has no flash.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: working very slow after just a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I set the phone up and it works great but The battery started to die quickly after about ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone came in brand-new, sealed packaging. This was a gift, I set the phone up and it works great but The battery started to die quickly after about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dkindred

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly pleased with my phone
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly pleased with my phone. I read mixed reviews, mainly due to phone storage, but it's easily avoided by having an SD card. I also went into Settings and disabled the Facebook app (I never liked it anyways), and I just use Facebook on my Browser. This is the best phone I've owned for this price. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crater

customer_reviews.title: Its oK but not for avid phone users
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone, however the memory is low but its a great starter phone.

customer_reviews.title: what a load of
customer_reviews.text: DON'T DO IT!!! no storage at all and no way to switch to sd card. Bought a 16g wont put any apps or contacts or anything on it even after making it switch to sd memory. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: kevin l caldwell

customer_reviews.title: it was a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth a 5 star rating, but well worth the money. I got it because it is cheap and fulfills the basics of what I need. Some aspects exceeded my expectations, some did not meet them, but overall, it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandson. He likes it very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But otherwise a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Memory space runs out quick, you can only install a limited number of apps. But otherwise a great phone.

customer_reviews.title: GSM un-supported
customer_reviews.text: Nice model and beautiful features. I really admire this phone and thought it works on GSM networks not knowing it doesn't. It's being waste of money buying and wish i can return it.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone and It was in perfect condition,perfect camera and nice keys

customer_reviews.text: Good quality no scratches, but it constantly restarts itself. Must get a mini SD card if you are buying one. Limited storage.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This photoshoot work worth a crap. How do I contact the seller?

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its okay. it turns on in my pocket after unlocking itself and calls 911. IM NOT KIDDING.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone giving it 2star's due to was no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone giving it 2star's due to was no longer able to talk with out putting it on speaker plus I was unaware the warranty from the owner was only 14 day I learned that when it try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: DON`T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Just don't. It has terrible storage and mine recently has been corrupted. HTC said that it happens "randomly" due to recent software updates and the last time it was updated was 10 months ago so that doesn't add up. My recommendation if you`re looking to buy this phone is, just don't.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: worked excellent..
customer_reviews.text: worked excellent...for about a week. then it froze on the start up screen and wouldn't turn back on. I tried hard resetting the phone, even tried talking to HTC directly, with no luck. amazon is great about returning items luckily. I got my money back after a few days of sending the phone back. I'd say this phone is well worth the money but good luck. you might get a dud like I did.
customer_reviews.author: megan lott

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This phone was the for me it was for my niece so I can't really go too much into review it but so far it's been good. My niece isn't complaining either since she seems to really like it. It also came on time so I appreciate that as well. Overall we're satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Georgetta Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from Kyocera rise big time upgrade loving this phone got it for 47.bucks

customer_reviews.title: warning to anyone who is hoping to take a decent ...

customer_reviews.title: They sent me a phone that does not work with ...

product_meta.title: Virgin Mobile - HTC Desire 510 4g No-contract Cell Phone - Black
product_meta.description: HTC Desire 510 No-Contract Cell Phone for Virgin Mobile: Enjoy live updates from your favorite social networks and news sources with the HTC Desire 510, which features HTC BlinkFeed that streams your preferred feeds to your home screen to keep you informed at a glance. You can capture important moments in 1080p using the 5.0MP rear-facing camera or snap photos with ease using HTC Zoe.
feature_bullets: Virgin Mobile HTC Desire 510 4G No-Contract Cell Phone
